app_descript:
App Name: File Magic

Brief: File Magic is a comprehensive mobile utility application designed to revitalize your phone's performance by decluttering storage, enhancing security, and managing apps effectively. Packed with a variety of features, it serves as an all-in-one cleaning and optimization tool for keeping your device clean, secure, and organized.
